summary: 1998 CHEVY S 10...WINDSHIELD WIPERS STOP WORKING WHEN IN RAIN.....NEVER KNOW WHEN IT IS GOING TO HAPPEN, OTHER THAN WHEN RAINS.....I ALSO HAVE A 1997 CHEVY S 10 BLAZER WHICH DOES THE SAME THING...CHEVY HAS RECALLED THOSE MOTORS TO BE FIXED...BUT WHEN I CALLED THEM TO TELL THEM OF THE SAME PROBLEM WITH THE 1998....THEY SAID THEY WOULD NOT COVER THAT....I TOLD THEM OF HAVING BOTH VEHICLES (I BOUGHT BOTH OF THEM NEW)....THAT I KNEW THE PROBLEM WAS EXACTLY THE SAME....WAS TOLD TO DRIVE  TO DEALER WHERE I BOUGHT THE VEHICLE....AND WAS TOLD THERE IT WOULD NOT BE COVERED. LAST OCCURRENCE WAS 4,21,03.....*JB
